item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! I’m Angelo Ceccato, are you welcome! My nickname is AngeloChecked✔️ I’m a developer that daily try to: Fight my own Cognitive Bias; Follow the Agile Manifesto; Apply the XP rules;

item.title: My Personal Tech Limbo (and Elixir vs Rust)
item.description: Another programming language battle? Elixir vs Rust who will be the winner? Why I wanted to write this article because I need a place to release all my suppressed emotions. My brain is obsessed with programming languages. I’m in the Tech Hype Cycle and instead of deep learning real stuff I’m procrastinating in a paradox of choice, information overload and FOMO hell. I want to pick a programming language to learn and focus on it.
